document.full_text: an 11-year-old girl on a school trip to the popular shore resort at wildwood, new jersey plunged to her death on friday as she was riding on an amusement park ferris wheel.
document.title: girl falls to death from new jersey ferris wheel
lines_and_colors: an 11-year-old girl on a school trip to the popular shore resort at wildwood, new jersey plunged to her death on friday as she was riding on an amusement park ferris wheel.
